text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53-7777 Gaming Notebooks - 17.3" FHD 144 Hz IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53-7777 Gaming Notebooks - 17.3" FHD 144 Hz IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53-7777 Gaming Notebooks - 17.3" FHD 144 Hz IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53-7777 Gaming Notebooks - 17.3" FHD 144 Hz IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH317-53-7777 Gaming Notebooks - 17.3" FHD 144 Hz IPS, Intel Core i7-9750H 2.60 GHz, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti, 16 GB DDR4 Memory, 512 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home!
